verbs.description: < p > I [V: do] n’t mince words : Trump is a pathological liar , a sexual predator and an adulterer . He is morally corrupt . Why would anyone want to be loyal to him?</p >

< p > [ARG0: I] do [ARGM-NEG: n’t] [V: mince] [ARG1: words] : Trump is a pathological liar , a sexual predator and an adulterer . He is morally corrupt . Why would anyone want to be loyal to him?</p >
< p > I do n’t mince words : [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: a pathological liar , a sexual predator and an adulterer] . He is morally corrupt . Why would anyone want to be loyal to him?</p >
< p > I do n’t mince words : Trump is a pathological liar , a sexual predator and an adulterer . [ARG1: He] [V: is] [ARG2: morally corrupt] . Why would anyone want to be loyal to him?</p >
< p > I do n’t mince words : Trump is a pathological liar , a sexual predator and an adulterer . He is morally corrupt . Why [V: would] anyone want to be loyal to him?</p >

< p > I do n’t mince words : Trump is a pathological liar , a sexual predator and an adulterer . He is morally corrupt . [ARGM-CAU: Why] [ARGM-MOD: would] [ARG0: anyone] [V: want] [ARG1: to be loyal to] him?</p >
